description.en: Europecoin is a cryptocurrency with unique social, economical, political and technical features, own unique policies and ongoing future prospects EuropeCoin is a Cryptocurrency just like Bitcoin, but with some major differences, like paying interest on every balance. Europecoin has a new Bitcoin Core 11.3 and is inspired by Hodl Coin, but improved, sporting a new, self-developed Retargeting Mechanism and Bitbreak Blockchain Shield.
